attributes.action: Stop discrimination against British residents Covid-19 vaccinated outside UK
attributes.additional_details: It is discriminatory to offer the no quarantine rule for double jabbed, only to people that had their vaccines in NHS. There are numerous residents and citizens in UK with dual citizenship that should not be treated differently if they are vaccinated in other country. If UK is not ready to receive travelers without quarantine then UK should not allow anybody to return country without quarantine. Covid-19 vaccine is Covid-19 vaccine no mather which country administred it.
attributes.background: All people double vaccinated should be able to feel free and not need to quarantine when returning from amber countries no mather which country they had their vacines in. Or are the vaccines in other countries not good?
